commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas324da24"

diff:
"324da24 Reftest for SVG inline in XUL, bug 364732.
diff --git a/layout/reftests/svg/inline-in-xul-basic-01.xul b/layout/reftests/svg/inline-in-xul-basic-01.xul
new file mode 100755
index 0000000..6078336
--- /dev/null
+++ b/layout/reftests/svg/inline-in-xul-basic-01.xul
@@ -0,0 +1,12 @@
+<!--
+     Any copyright is dedicated to the Public Domain.
+     http://creativecommons.org/licenses/publicdomain/
+-->
+
+<!-- From https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=364732 -->
+
+<box xmlns="http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul" flex="1">
+  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
+    <rect fill="lime" width="100%" height="100%"/>
+  </svg>
+</box>
diff --git a/layout/reftests/svg/reftest.list b/layout/reftests/svg/reftest.list
index 9ff5a3e..288bec6 100755
--- a/layout/reftests/svg/reftest.list
+++ b/layout/reftests/svg/reftest.list
@@ -9,6 +9,7 @@ fails-if(MOZ_WIDGET_TOOLKIT=="cocoa") == clipPath-basic-01.svg pass.svg # bug 37
 == foreignObject-move-repaint-01.svg pass.svg
 == foreignObject-overflow-01.svg pass.svg
 == getElementById-a-element-01.svg pass.svg
+== inline-in-xul-basic-01.xul pass.svg
 == nested-viewBox-01.svg pass.svg
 fails-if(MOZ_WIDGET_TOOLKIT=="cocoa") == opacity-and-gradient-01.svg pass.svg # bug 379610
 == opacity-and-pattern-01.svg pass.svg
"
